name: Create a Google Docs document from a new Wix form submission
description:
Every time a visitor fills out a Wix form on your site, Make will automatically create a Google Docs document (from a Google Docs template) with form submission details.

You can look at this [Google Docs document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1T1HuRAGFro5pWEA2S_bp72BZuj3f-6bO6YOEaUzVLiw/edit?usp=sharing) for inspiration. Use {{ }} brackets for the text you want to replace with items from the submitted form.
